Articles.Content:
> 
> 3PM of Sunday right?

Kenbob is right, it's 2:30PM Sunday the 26th.

Edit: Squad is in the central timezone IIRC.

If you're updating your store KSP team, how come I can see this?

(updating image so it doesn't show my order ID

(btw yes it is still 0.90)

> 
> 
> 
> Interesting.

> 
> Central, I think? Two timezones ahead of me, which is PST.

I thought they were in Mexico City, right? You sure that's in central time?

Guys,everything's breaking,lagging,and slow......what if......it's actually released....

*Tonight???*

Darn. My heart skipped a beat.

WHY YOU SO TROLL?

We're reaching more than one post a minute!

HYPE ON!

> 
> I thought they were in Mexico City, right? You sure that's in central time?

According to this it is: [http://www.timeanddate.com/time/map/](http://www.timeanddate.com/time/map/)

I not sure whats happening so...

![2074yu4sw2.gif](http://www.gifbin.com/bin/2074yu4sw2.gif)
Program alarm, 502!

> 
> Program alarm, 502!

Yes. More 502's.

I can honestly say I've never been more excited for a video game release. I haven't played KSP since December last year because it kept changing. I held out for 1.0. I'm giddy. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> According to this it is: [http://www.timeanddate.com/time/map/](http://www.timeanddate.com/time/map/)

Ah, yes, thank you my good sir.

Less trolling, moar releasing!

In the Free Republic of Renegradia (created early this afternoon), it is officially 11:59pm on Monday, April 27th. Squad has exactly 60 seconds to avoid being late~

Also as Totally Not A Dictator President for Life Renegrade, I hereby proclaim that missing a release date is punishable by the most dire punishment possible (having to fetch a shrubbery, or maybe having to cut down the biggest tree in the forest with a herring...or BOTH!). Chop, chop!

It's slowing down! THE HYPE IS BREAKING THE SERVER!

C'mon, we can do it!
How soon?
Speaking of bugfixes, has anybody noticed in the streams whether the 'slippery ladder' bug is fixed?

> 
> According to this it is: [http://www.timeanddate.com/time/map/](http://www.timeanddate.com/time/map/)

It's not in CST, it's just in a time zone that is coincidentally equivalent to CDT i.e. CST during Daylights saving time (which happens to currently be in effect).

> 
> How soon?

Not soon enough
Allow me to rephrase the question. What time EST is this expected to drop? I might do another video then. Trying to plan what time I've got.

> 
> How soon?

Trademark SoonÃ¢â€žÂ¢.

> 
> Allow me to rephrase the question. What time EST is this expected to drop? I might do another video then. Trying to plan what time I've got.

We're not sure. All we know is "Tomorrow" they haven't said what time.
Just got a 505 error a minute ago.

I was fully expecting the Hype Train to freak out close to the release. I am a bit surprised by the extra hype and speculation more than 8 hours prior to the earliest possible release time. Ha ha ha, more HYPE!

\*might possibly\* be today

might

ANYTHING IS POSSIBLE
